questions.template: How effectively have safeguards been implemented for collecting {data_types}?
Could your organization improve the process of obtaining consent before collecting {data_types}?
Are documented procedures consistently followed when handling {data_types} during collection?
Does your organization maintain comprehensive records of collected {data_types}?
Should data minimization practices be more rigorously applied when collecting {data_types}?
What measures exist to manage {rights} requests formally?
How thoroughly is identity verification conducted for all {rights} requests?
Could the tracking system for fulfilling {rights} requests be enhanced?
Are employees adequately trained on requirements relating to {rights}?
How well are protections enforced to prevent discrimination against consumers exercising {rights}?
Is the mechanism for submitting {rights} requests clearly accessible and user-friendly?
To what extent have security measures been implemented to protect stored {data_types}?
How consistently are {security} controls tested and updated across your organization?
What is the current level of implementation of processes to detect breaches involving {data_types}?
To what degree have additional {security} protections been applied to sensitive {data_types}?
How fully are {security} standards enforced during the transmission of {data_types}?
To what extent has the organization implemented measures to demonstrate compliance with {requirements}?
How well are documents maintained to support compliance with {requirements}?
To what degree are {processes} regularly reviewed to ensure continued compliance with {requirements}?
How fully has training been delivered to ensure staff understand {requirements}?
